main event: An unusual light was observed in the sky over Clinton, Iowa, circling three times before disappearing.
interesting points: The light was estimated at 7,000 ft, in the shape of a triangular halo,The object followed a zig-zag course and hovered just above the witnesses,The observation lasted for approximately 60 seconds,The object made a sharp loop and climbed to 3,500 ft before hovering,No photographs or physical evidence were obtained.
witness description: The witness is a clerk employed at the Illinois Headquarters and is considered honest and reliable.
